abstract: The cable provider Comcast won European Union regulatory clearance on Wednesday for a landmark deal to buy a controlling stake in General Electric’s NBC Universal.
snippet: The cable provider Comcast won European Union regulatory clearance on Wednesday for a landmark deal to buy a controlling stake in General Electric’s NBC Universal.
lead_paragraph: United States cable provider Comcast won European Union regulatory clearance on Wednesday for a landmark deal to buy a controlling stake in General Electric‘s NBC Universal, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Comcast Wins E.U. Approval for NBC Deal
